Reviews.Title: Not as advertised
Reviews.Author: mark mueller
Reviews.Content: I got this about a hour ago and as for the functionality of the laptop I can not say much yet because I have not had it very long, but what I can say is that what is listed on Amazon for the spec is incorrect. I doesn't come with a Core i7 4500u processor, it comes with a Core i7 3537u, also it does not have a 1TB hard drive it is only a 500GB hard drive. I have not decided yet if I am going to return it or not but I am going to wait a day and see it it works out for me.8/15/2013Well I have been using the laptop for a few weeks now and I like it a lot. The only minor problem I have seen is that at times the glossy screen has a reflection which makes it hard to see, but other then that I like the laptop. Overall I think Asus made a good product and Amazon was too lazy to check there listing before they put it online.

Reviews.Title: Different to what I ordered - Satisfied in the end
Reviews.Author: Gavin Mandy
Reviews.Content: What I ordered was a notebook with an I7-4500 CPU and 1TB hard drive and instead I got a I7-3537 CPU with a 500GB hard drive. These are not desciption mistakes, but rather fundamental differences - what was delivered is a fundamentally different machine to what was ordered.UPDATE - 7 Aug 13In the end I kept the machine and was impressed with how Amazon handled this issue. I see that they have now updated the website to more acurately reflect what was delivered, however, right at the bottom of the product description it still seems incorrect.Overall I am very happy with the machine - for a 15.6" machine it is lightweight and thin and an example of this is that you can easily sit with it on your lap for as long as is needed without the machine becoming heavy or hot. The screen size makes working for extended periods of time a breeze and the touch screen is great. There is no optical disk so if you need one you would need to order additionally.

Reviews.Title: Good Computer, Works perfectly I think..
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly... FIrst PC in a long ass time... way cheaper and better value than macbook... trust me i took forever 2 decide.

Reviews.Title: great laptop at the price
Reviews.Author: mark
Reviews.Content: okay here are the pros and conspros:1. intel 4000 HD graphics card2. when you register your device your get a 1 year protection plan from basically everything3.I7 processor4. under 1000 dollars5. touch screencons:1. windows 82. dealing with amazon3. no CD Romoverall good buy works great with gaming and computer drafting

Reviews.Title: awesome laptop
Reviews.Author: leibnitz
Reviews.Content: first thing I did was put in an SSD and wow this is a fast unit.  touch screen is nice. the whole laptop seems very sturdy.  windows 8 becomes usable when startisback is installed.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Shelia S.
Reviews.Content: I had to send 3 of them back because the 1st one had rattling inside of it and the other 2 had keys sticking. I dnt blame amazon because I think its ASUS fault for not checking their items before packaging them.

Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: Peanut
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time and works perfectly. It's really fast and better than what I was expecting. The price was also great.

Reviews.Title: better than expected
Reviews.Author: Trixter808
Reviews.Content: have yet to tap into it ,it's very fast ask me again  in 6 months , windows 8 touch screen needs some work !  has plus's and negatives ,

Reviews.Title: good laptop
Reviews.Author: Nataliya Epelman
Reviews.Content: web cam quality is bad,as well as pictures taken with itset up and touch screen is perfectquiet and fast, pretty light

Reviews.Title: Fix for space bar
Reviews.Author: Raymond C
Reviews.Content: In this review, I mainly want to help any fellow Asus vivobook owner who has problems with their space bar problem not registering the key press.Upon receiving my V500CA, I love everything of it except 2 things. 1) the screen does not look as good as IPS screen with poor viewing angle, but for the price of this laptop, it is acceptable.  and 2) the space bar was not sensitive enough.  I personally like to press the space bar on the bottom right corner lightly.  But the space bar in the V500CA would often miss the key press.  After doing a lot of searching for this space bar problem, it appears to be the key not being sensitive enough.  After being annoyed with it for a couple of days, I finally decided to fix it once and for all.  I pulled the space bar out very carefully since it is very easy to break.  After the space bar plastic is off, I immediately saw the problem.  There is only one single actual key and it is in the center on the space bar.  When pressing on the corner slightly, it causes the key to press at a slightly off angle.  This cause the key press not to register.  The fix is very simple.  I just put 2 layers of clear tape inside the space bar plastic to make the contact better.  So far, it has been working fine.  Space bar is very sensitive.  Hope this will help anyone having trouble with their space bar.

Reviews.Title: Pretty great
Reviews.Author: Penny "Penny"
Reviews.Content: I'm quite enjoying my new laptop thus far. It's light weight, it's fast, and it's pretty easy to use. I'm still getting used to Windows 8, and the mousepad is very sensitive, so I frequently unintentionally move the mouse somewhere on the screen that I didn't intend to, but that's all part of getting used to a new computer. It doesn't have a place for a CD, but it does have a card slot on the side, which makes it easy to upload pictures from my camera.

Reviews.Title: great computer
Reviews.Author: bridgets mom "House of Night  Lover"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my daughter for graduation I wanted her to have the most up to date that I could afford she will be using this to take online classes for college. I was going to buy a sony because that is what I have but mine is older and new ones do not get good reviews. I know several people with Asus computers, but one thing that impressed me when my friend call the customer support about his older Asus need help with software not loading issues he got some help (they are not suppose to tell you how to download software) they were polite and patient with him not understanding some computer terms. I would buy another Asus.

Reviews.Title: I liked it, but...
Reviews.Author: Maridelia Esteves
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent purchase, i love it, i'm using it to simulate adn develope androids appp, runs perfect and blablabla, BUT, in the descriptions says that it comes with an 8GB RAM and the one i got, has only 6GB, i can't return it because i'm outside USA.

Reviews.Title: Buy another brand!
Reviews.Author: Martha Larios
Reviews.Content: We received this new purchase today and fully read User's Manual before turning it on, charged it for 3 hours, as stated in instructions.  Machine has completely failed to turn on, absolutely NO screen activity, drive indicator flashes for a minute then completely turns off.  Called ASUS technical support and they walked me though process to try to start and we were not successfu.  Returning this product to Amazon tomorrow!Dec 10, 2013This should count as a separate review on the same model, but Amazon won't allow it.  I've exchanged first non-working laptop I initially received with exact same model and I had the exact same issue - screen would not turn on.  This time I asked the IT helpdesk manager at my company to look at it.  He connected laptop to external monitor and updated operating system and drivers without success.  The laptop functions but screen does failed to turn on. This time, I am exchanging for different maker.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing-Bad space bar.
Reviews.Author: Gary Watters
Reviews.Content: I was very excited to get this laptop.  High expectations.  then I started setting it up and fount it to be glitchy.  The screen would change to another screen while typing in form fields.  It seemed slower than I expected as well (its an i7).  Then when I was starting to type things that were more than one word in length I found that the space bar only worked about half of the time.  I don't know how anyone could work with this kind of issue.  After discovering this problem I found, online, that others have experienced the same problem with their ASUS laptops.  I'm glad I purchased it from a reputable company that I could return it to.

Reviews.Title: Screen started to open at the top
Reviews.Author: Belize Trade and Investment
Reviews.Content: The hardware of the screen started to come apart within 3 weeks of using this product.The glass started to unstick from the monitor panel at the top edge.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop with some problems
Reviews.Author: W. H Tang "Reader"
Reviews.Content: Pro:1. lightweight2. good looking3. 3rd Gen i74. 8 GB RAM5. excellent price6. low heat generation7. touchscreen8. great audioCon:1. missing a screw at the bottom (it is a used laptop)2. VGA and HDMI ports are too close that you cannot use both unless you cut a part of VGA plug off3. Replace the HDD drive with SSD drive is a pain. You have to change the BIOS (multiple times) and the Windows registry to make the SSD being recognized and works on AHCI.4. Use USB Flash drive (external DVD drive doesn't work) to do Windows 8.1 clean installation5. Download a lot of drivers and utilities from ASUS (both Windows 8 and Windows 8.1 64 bit)6. keyboard typing with some hit-or miss especially the space bar.

Reviews.Title: returned
Reviews.Author: William E. Brokaw
Reviews.Content: Most components of the computer worked fine with exception of wireless hardware. One can't live without wireless . So it was returned.

Reviews.Title: LOve IT
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I searched for quite a while for a new laptop searching between tablets and laptops. I previously owned an ASUS that worked fine for several years. ASUS upgraded the sound card and the battery life in this model over my previous laptop. Very nice looking light weight computer. I seen in previous reviews something about key board issues not sure what that is all about this one is fine I have owned it for a couple months now and it is working great.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for colledge student in engineering.
Reviews.Author: Jon R. Butts
Reviews.Content: She said she Loved it, met her expectations as well. She has been using ASUS computers for school and personal life for several years.

Reviews.Title: Really Good laptop
Reviews.Author: sentinel
Reviews.Content: Pros:-The specs are awesome for heavy users. Its fast and the touch screen is really impressive.-Its light and thin which is kinda the point of using a laptop.Cons-It gets a lot of fingerprint streaks since its a touch screen but you can just do what i did and get an anti-scratch screen protector for like $8.-The battery life is kind of short. I get about 3 hours of watching shows, coding and general surfing. I don't game on it though.OverallI love it. As a software developer, I spend a lot of time on my laptop and I can definitely say this laptop is worth the money you pay for it. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice!
Reviews.Author: izz
Reviews.Content: This laptop was absolutely perfect for my needs. It has enough power/memory for me to complete computational intensive programs with no fuss. It does take some getting used to when typing as the narrow width seems sharper on the forearms. The screen resolution is amazing. People looking at it remark on how clear it is.It has a great weight and the metal casing makes it seem more durable. However, it is prone to finger smudges.

Reviews.Title: Disgusted and Disappointed Client
Reviews.Author: Joylette Woodley
Reviews.Content: You have to be extremely careful when buying this product, the one that is advertised  and u think u are buying is not necessarily the one that u would get.....u have to read the FINE PRINTS to make sure ......ITS FRAUDULOUS!!!!!!! I wanted one with a CD drive, the one that I saw had everything including the CD drive but when i got my pc there was no CD drive. When I revisited amazon website where it is sold I saw in the very FIIIIIINE PRINTS that this model doesnt have a CD drive. So they are fooling customers, showing u a ":model laptop" with everything for an awesome price, so u think u are getting a "great deal" when in fact its not that way. Should I BE FOOLED BECAUSE I WANT A "GREAT DEAL" in this hard economic times. SHAMEFUL!!!!!To make matters worst when i got the pc, the battery stopped working ABOUT ONE WEEK AFTER.....it just stopped hold charge, i figured been new it may take awhile but after about 4 days  I realized the problem  was  NOT resolving. I contacted the seller through Amazon( approximately 11 dys after delivery), the buyer took about 10 days to respond and when he did his advice leaned towards me loosing my warranty LUCKILY I READ MY WARRANTY CARD BOOKLET so i didn't "tamper" with the computer as he wanted me to do. So when i responded with my concerns and told him that i wanted to return the product I WAS TOLD THAT THE LAPTOP WAS NO LONGER ELIGIBLE FOR RETURN B/C 30 DYS HAVE PASSED SINCE DELIVERY and me initializing the "return" before the 30 dys DOESNT HELP THE SITUATION. So that's why the seller waited soooooo long to repsond the first time....hoping that my 30 days would run out.I cannot believe that this has happened and I will continue to write BAAAAAAD REVIEWS ABOUT THIS PRODUCT AND THE SELLER. AMAZON NEEDS TO SCRUTINIZE THESE SELLERS. I did business with amazon for many years because OF quality service.......SO WHAT IS GOING ON!!!!!! This product DOES NOT DESERVE A STAR RATING.

Reviews.Title: REPLY
Reviews.Author: Williamc Wicks
Reviews.Content: JUST WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOUR...WILL RECOMEND IT  TO MY FRIENDS..THANK YOU...THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK Y,ALL .... HAVE A NICE FOR EVER.....

Reviews.Title: Liar !!!
Reviews.Author: K. Rungruj "kiv"
Reviews.Content: I ordered was a notebook with an I7-4500 CPU and 1TB hard drive and instead I got a I7-3537 CPU with a 500GB hard drive.Liar !!!

Reviews.Title: BAD PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Diego
Reviews.Content: I had problems with my new computer,  not start correctly, this problem is recurrent,  I would not recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Awful Customer Service And Awful Product
Reviews.Author: Miranda Greene
Reviews.Content: First I ordered a similar laptop from amazon on their cyber Monday deal for $200 which was awesome until about 7 hrs after I got my shipping and order confirmation I get an e-mail from amazon saying my order was cancelled due to "mispricing"  so I call amazon and get nowhere with their awfull customer service that can barely speak/understand English after that I decided to send them a lovely e-mail stated how I felt and that I was canceling my 3 other orders I had made that day equaling about $500 , they e-mail me back stating that they don't even sell the laptop and it was a mistake which isn't my problem If you post something on your main deals page for cyber Monday you better honor it which after about 5 emails and 1 phone call they finally did and next day aired me this laptop which was a Christmas present and come to find out after it was gifted the dumb thing wont even turn on! so I called asus customer service which was worse than amazons and they send me a shipping label to send it back to get fixed so I do that I just got it back today and guess what.. it still doesn't work!!!!! WTH im done with amazon and Asus save yourself some heartache and buy a apple product atleast they have excellent customer service
